short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chromium browser add-on/extension to automatically capitalise the first letter of a sentence in text fields while typing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension to automatically capitalise the first letter of a sentence in text fields while typing. It also capitalises some words (proper nouns) and has some goodies.
